title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits 

(Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2024. 

(2) The collection citation “the Employment Permits Regulations 2017 to 

2024” includes these Regulations.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited employment permit (amendment) (no 3) regulation 2024 (2) collection citation employment permit regulation 2017 2024 includes regulation

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the Employment Permits Regulations 2017 (S.I 
No. 95 of 2017); 

“Regulations of 2023” means the Employment Permit (Amendment) (No. 3) 
Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 680 of 2023).
text_norm: 2 regulations-- principal regulation mean employment permit regulation 2017 (s.i no 95 2017) regulation 2023 mean employment permit (amendment) (no 3) regulation 2023 (s.i no 680 2023)

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 3. Regulation 8(2) (as amended by Regulation 4 of the Employment Permits
text_raw:
3. Regulation 8(2) (as amended by Regulation 4 of the Employment Permits 
(Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations (S.I. No. 677 of 2022)) of the Principal 
Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

in subparagraph (m), by substituting “horticulture worker, meat 
processor operative or sea fisher in the Irish fishing fleet” for 
“horticulture worker or meat processor operative”, 

(b) 

in subparagraph (p), by substituting “employment;” for 
“employment; and”, 

(c) 

in subparagraph (q), by substituting “made; and” for “made.”, and 

(d) by inserting after subparagraph (q) the following subparagraph: 

“(r) in the case of an application for employment as a sea fisher 
in the Irish fishing fleet— 

(I) 

a clear and complete copy of the terms of employment, 
work agreement or contract of employment, entered into by 
the foreign national in respect of whom the application is 
made, in the English language, including— 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [328] 3 

(A) 

the particulars required under the Fisherman’s Work 
Agreement provided for under Regulation 7 of the 
European Union (International Labour Organisation 
Work in Fishing Convention) (Crew List and 
Fisherman’s Work Agreement) Regulations 2020, 

(B) 

the particulars required under the Principal Act and 
Section 3(1) and Section 3(1A) of the Terms of 
Employment (Information) Act 1994 (No. 5 of 1994), 

(C) details of the periodic payments of the minimum 

annual remuneration, and 

(D) all deductions from pay, including any deduction for 
the provision of food or accommodation by the 
employer while on the fishing vessel, 

(II) a certified translation of the agreement or contract referred 
to in clause (I) in a language comprehensible to the sea 
fisher, and 

(III) a copy of a declaration signed by the person who makes the 
offer of employment that that person will ensure the foreign 
national concerned will be enrolled in a Bord Iascaigh 
Mhara 
to 
commencement of employment in accordance with the 
Fishing Vessel (Basic Safety Training) Regulations 2001 
(S.I. No. 587 of 2001).”. 

(BIM) Safety Training Scheme prior

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 4. Schedule 3 (as amended by Regulation 11 of the Regulations of 2023) of
text_raw:

the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting for entry SOC-3 no. 354 
the following: 

“

Employment 

SOC 4

Related 
Associate 
Professionals

3543

which is not a Member State of the EEA and is 
not an official language of an EEA state 
International marketing experts with required 
domain knowledge specialising in product 
strategy development and management with 
technical and product/service knowledge 
(pharmaceutical, medical devices, Software B2B, 
SaaS products) 

354 

”.

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 5. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Schedule 4
text_raw:
5. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Schedule 4 
(as amended by Regulation 11 of the Regulations of 2023) the Schedule set out 
in the Schedule to these Regulations.
text_norm: 5 principal regulation amended substituting schedule 4 (as amended regulation 11 regulation 2023) schedule set schedule regulation

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Employment Permits Regulations 2017 to provide 
for employment permits for sea fishers in the Irish fishing fleet and make other 
minor amendments to the schedules thereto. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 
3) Regulations 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 20 [328]
